item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. I wrote to the address in the GPLv2 license notice and received the GPLv3 license ( points | 5 comments)
2. GitHub potential leaking of private emails and Hacker One ( points | 5 comments)
3. Protecting NATS and the integrity of open source: CNCF’s commitment to the community ( points | 3 comments)
4. Implementing Unsure Calculator in 100 lines of Haskell ( points | no comments)
5. How Discord Indexes Trillions of Messages ( points | 1 comment)
6. Oniguruma, a popular regex library, is archived, the project "ended" ( points | 12 comments)
7. PATH should be a system call ( points | 2 comments)
8. Bevy 0.16 ( points | 4 comments)
9. Avoid continue ( points | 43 comments)
10. How I Got Hacked: A Warning about Malicious PoCs ( points | 1 comment)
11. You wouldn't steal a font ( points | 16 comments)
12. Towards Vortex 1.0 ( points | 1 comment)
13. Requirements change until they don't ( points | 1 comment)
14. The ‘trickonometry’ of math olympiad inequalities ( points | no comments)
15. How decentralized is the fediverse, really? [mastodon post] ( points | 1 comment)
16. The tools I love are made by awful people ( points | 71 comments)
17. Notation as a Tool of Thought (1979) ( points | no comments)
18. Speeding up Ruby by rewriting C… in Ruby ( points | 3 comments)

20. Observability 2.0 and the Database for It ( points | no comments)

22. First Successful Lightning Triggering and Guiding Using a Drone ( points | 1 comment)

24. How a 20 year old bug in GTA San Andreas surfaced in Windows 11 24H2 ( points | 4 comments)
25. How Commodore Invented the Mass Market Computer ( points | 1 comment)
